attributes.action: scrap the uk entry to the next Eurovison song contest
attributes.additional_details:
I would like the Government to Debate the option for the UK to pull out of the next Eurovision Song contest as it serves no real purpose and the money that we invest in it could be better used in another area for E.G child poverty which would serve the future generations far more.

so in short scrap our entry and any participation in the euro song contest.

rejection.details: The BBC is responsible for the UK entry to the Eurovision Song Contest.
